metadata.synopsis:
This occurs in the swamp. Sheep wander the area - except they're redcaps (a type of violent faerie) hidden by the hag's illusions. The creatures are pretending to be sheep. 
The illusion can be shattered by an animal handling check. OR if the player preciously succeeded in a perception check in the area.
metadata.how_to_trigger: loadlevel WLD_Main_Agoto 16.329; 5.499; 248.268ignore feeling OR roll amazing in investigationspeak w sheep/redcap

38.speaker: Narrator
38.text: *Again? This creature doesn't realise you can see its true form.*

9.speaker: Narrator
9.text: *The sheep's voice warbles. You realise it's trying to say 'Baa'.*

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Tell me about this place, sheep.

36.speaker: Redcap Blood Sage, Redcap, Redcap Blood Sage, 0446e7c4-3076-415c-aa7f-deb7f43e5d06, Redcap, a72e6051-d06b-469c-b6dc-4c962cfe307f

30.speaker: Narrator
30.text: *Curious. Despite your form, the creature doesn't understand you.*

21.speaker: Narrator
21.text: *Curious. Despite your magic, the creature doesn't understand you.*

16.speaker: Player
16.text: Drop your eyes and carefully reach out.
16.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sheep illusion wavers and the creature transforms into a redcap

54.speaker: Narrator
54.text: *The smell of rot assaults your senses as the illusion vanishes.*
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sheep illusion wavers and the creature transforms into a redcap

19.speaker: Narrator
19.text: *The smell of rot assaults your senses as the illusion vanishes.*
19.context: CinematicNodeContext: The sheep illusion wavers and the creature transforms into a redcap

12.text: *A diminutive creature sporting a red hat glares at you. He seems unaware that his illusion has failed.*
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Redcap doesn't realize the jig is up, thinks you think he's still a sheep.

25.speaker: Player
25.context: NodeContext: Think Gollum - fragmented animal like speech - cruel and threatening

32.speaker: Redcap Blood Sage, Redcap, Redcap Blood Sage, 0446e7c4-3076-415c-aa7f-deb7f43e5d06, Redcap, a72e6051-d06b-469c-b6dc-4c962cfe307f
32.text: Nosy, scum-sucking, lice-ridden little ballbag. Get outs! Or I bites tongue. Eats tongue. Delicious tongue.
32.context: NodeContext: Think Gollum - fragmented animal like speech - cruel and threatening

1.speaker: Player
1.text: All right! No need to get nasty.
1.context: NodeContext: Think Gollum - fragmented animal like speech - cruel and threatening

43.speaker: Redcap Blood Sage, Redcap, Redcap Blood Sage, 0446e7c4-3076-415c-aa7f-deb7f43e5d06, Redcap, a72e6051-d06b-469c-b6dc-4c962cfe307f
43.text: Aw, precious baby. Loves to bleed you - yes. Turn your corpse into sponge. Lots of holes. Yes.
43.context: NodeContext: Think Gollum - fragmented animal like speech - cruel and threatening

27.speaker: Redcap Blood Sage, Redcap, Redcap Blood Sage, 0446e7c4-3076-415c-aa7f-deb7f43e5d06, Redcap, a72e6051-d06b-469c-b6dc-4c962cfe307f
27.text: Leave. NOW. Or I fill you with holes. And more. HAHA.

34.speaker: Player
34.context: NodeContext: Think Gollum - fragmented animal like speech - cruel and threatening

14.speaker: Redcap Blood Sage, Redcap, Redcap Blood Sage, 0446e7c4-3076-415c-aa7f-deb7f43e5d06, Redcap, a72e6051-d06b-469c-b6dc-4c962cfe307f
14.text: Hah! I bleed you. Cut you. Make many delicious holes. Yes. YES.
14.context: NodeContext: Think Gollum - fragmented animal like speech - cruel and threatening

58.speaker: Player
58.text: Take a deep breath and say 'BAA'.
58.context: NodeContext: Practically hissing it at the player - cruel and animalistic as you imagine ripping out their throat
